item.title: 【Asp】Asp HTML编码与解码 Asp转义字符
item.description: Asp HTML编码，Asp转义字符： <% Function EncodeHTML(str) str = Replace(str, ">", "&gt;") str = Replace(str, "<", "&lt;") str = Replace(str, Chr(34), "&quot;") EncodeHTML = str End Function %> Asp HTML解码，Asp转义字符： <% Function DecodeHTML(str) str = Replace(str, "&gt;", ">") str = Replace(str, "&lt;", "<") str

item.title: 【Asp】ASP Unescape加密/解密/编码/解码
item.description: ASP Unescape加密/编码，ASP Unescape加密，ASP Unescape编码： <% Function vbEscape(psString)     Dim nTemp, sTemp, sTempChar, nTempAsc     For nTemp =1 To Len(psString)         sTempChar =Mid(psString, nTemp, 1)         nTempAsc =Ascw(sTempChar)         If (nTempAsc >=48

item.title: 【Asp】ASP 将一段字符串进行Base64解码
item.description: ASP Base64解码： Function Bd(byVal si) 'Base64解码 For n=1 To Len(si) Step 4 a=md(Mid(si,n,1)) b=md(Mid(si,n+1,1)) c=md(Mid(si,n+2,1)) d=md(Mid(si,n+3,1)) If b>=0 Then s=s+Chr(((a*4+Int(b/16)) And 255)) If c>=0 Then s=s+Chr(((b*16+Int(c/4)) And 255)) If d>=0 Then s=s+Chr(((c*64+d) And 255)) Next bd=s End Function Function Md(byVal s) B64C="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/" If Len(s)=0 Then md=-1 Exit Function Else md=InStr(B64C,s)-1 End If End Function
